title: Stress, Sleep, and Sensory Processing Among Parents of Children With Autism Spectrum Disorder
author: Chang; Megan; Burr; Amanda; Staffaroni; Giselle; Adams; Molly; Gines; Crystal; Crawford; Jason
description: Abstract. Date Presented 4/20/2018This project aimed to show the importance of including the sensory processing preferences of parents of children with autism spectrum disorder in family interventionPrimary Author and Speaker: Megan ChangAdditional Authors and Speakers: Amanda Burr, Giselle Staffaroni, Molly Adams, Crystal Gines, Jason Crawford
